name: ViewTaskDetails
description:
Retrieve detailed information about a specific task.

Use this tool to get detailed information on a task you have access to in ClickUp, including any attachments associated with the task.

parameters.name: task_identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the task you want to retrieve details for in ClickUp.

parameters.name: workspace_id_for_custom_task
parameters.description: Provide the Workspace ID when referencing a task by its custom task ID. Required if `custom_task_ids` is true.

value_schema.description:
When the `custom_task_ids` parameter is set to `true`, the Workspace ID must be provided using the `team_id` parameter.
 \
For example: `custom_task_ids=true&team_id=123`.

parameters.name: filter_custom_fields
parameters.description: Include tasks with specific values in one or more custom fields using the specified JSON format. Custom Relationships are supported.

value_schema.description:
Include tasks with specific values in one or more Custom Fields. Custom Relationships are included.\
 \
For example: `?custom_fields=[{"field_id":"abcdefghi12345678","operator":"=","value":"1234"},{"field_id":"jklmnop123456","operator":"<","value":"5"}]`\
 \
Only set Custom Field values display in the `value` property of the `custom_fields` parameter. If you want to include tasks with specific values in only one Custom Field, use `custom_field` instead.\
 \
Learn more about [filtering using Custom Fields.](doc:filtertasks)

parameters.name: use_custom_task_ids
parameters.description: Set to true to reference a task by its custom task ID.

value_schema.description: If you want to reference a task by its custom task id, this value must be `true`.

parameters.name: include_subtasks
parameters.description: Include subtasks in the task details if set to true. Defaults to false.

parameters.name: include_markdown_description
parameters.description: Set to true to return task descriptions in Markdown format.

value_schema.description: To return task descriptions in Markdown format, use `?include_markdown_description=true`.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the clickup API.

parameters.name: custom_task_ids
parameters.description: If you want to reference a task by its custom task id, this value must be `true`.

value_schema.description: If you want to reference a task by its custom task id, this value must be `true`.

parameters.name: team_id
parameters.description:
When the `custom_task_ids` parameter is set to `true`, the Workspace ID must be provided using the `team_id` parameter.
 \
For example: `custom_task_ids=true&team_id=123`.

When the `custom_task_ids` parameter is set to `true`, the Workspace ID must be provided using the `team_id` parameter.
 \
For example: `custom_task_ids=true&team_id=123`.

parameters.name: include_markdown_description
parameters.description: To return task descriptions in Markdown format, use `?include_markdown_description=true`.

value_schema.description: To return task descriptions in Markdown format, use `?include_markdown_description=true`.

 \

Only set Custom Field values display in the `value` property of the `custom_fields` parameter. If you want to include tasks with specific values in only one Custom Field, use `custom_field` instead.\
 \
Learn more about [filtering using Custom Fields.](doc:filtertasks)

value_schema.description:
Include tasks with specific values in one or more Custom Fields. Custom Relationships are included.\
 \
For example: `?custom_fields=[{"field_id":"abcdefghi12345678","operator":"=","value":"1234"},{"field_id":"jklmnop123456","operator":"<","value":"5"}]`\

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
